c:simple-property.description: this SAR/WAR's context root - used as a unique path prefix for URLs corresponding to this WAR

c:simple-property.name: vHost
c:simple-property.description: The (virtual) host that this application is running on. If no virtual host is set, this defaults to 'localhost'

c:simple-property.name: jbossWebName
c:simple-property.description: the objectName for the jboss.web WebModule that will be used to fire operations

c:simple-property.name: responseTimeLogFile
c:simple-property.description: the full path to the log file containing response-time stats for this sipapp

c:simple-property.name: responseTimeUrlExcludes
c:simple-property.description: a space-delimited list of regular expressions specifying URLs that should be excluded from response-time stats collection

c:simple-property.name: responseTimeUrlTransforms
c:simple-property.description: a space-delimited list of Perl-style substitution expressions that should be applied to all URLs for which response-time stats are collected (e.g. |^/dept/finance/.*|/dept/finance/*|)
